com.hazelcast.map.impl

Class ExpirationTimeSetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.map.impl.ExpirationTimeSetter

  • public final class ExpirationTimeSetter
extends Object
    Utility methods for setting TTL and max idle seconds.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setExpirationTime

        public static void setExpirationTime(Record record,
                     long maxIdleMillis)
        Sets expiration time if statistics are enabled.

      • getIdlenessStartTime

        public static long getIdlenessStartTime(Record record)
        Returns last-access-time of an entry if it was accessed before, otherwise it returns creation-time of the entry. This calculation is required for max-idle-seconds expiration, because after first creation of an entry via IMap.put(K, V), the lastAccessTime is zero till the first access. Any subsequent get or update operation after first put will increase the lastAccessTime.

      • getLifeStartTime

        public static long getLifeStartTime(Record record)
        Returns last-update-time of an entry if it was updated before, otherwise it returns creation-time of the entry. This calculation is required for time-to-live expiration, because after first creation of an entry via IMap.put(K, V), the lastUpdateTime is zero till the first update.

      • pickTTL

        public static long pickTTL(long ttlMillis,
           long ttlMillisFromConfig)
        Picks right TTL value.

        Decides which TTL to set; TTL from config or put operation.

      • calculateMaxIdleMillis

        public static long calculateMaxIdleMillis(MapConfig mapConfig)

      • calculateTTLMillis

        public static long calculateTTLMillis(MapConfig mapConfig)

      • updateExpiryTime

        public static void updateExpiryTime(Record record,
                    long ttl,
                    MapConfig mapConfig)
        Updates records TTL and expiration time.

      • calculateExpirationWithDelay

        public static long calculateExpirationWithDelay(long timeInMillis,
                                long delayMillis,
                                boolean backup)
        On backup partitions, this method delays key`s expiration.
